channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Zelio Soft 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Zelio Soft 2

item.title: CVE-2024-8422|2024-10-08T13:51:54.776Z -- schneider%20electric -- zelio%20soft%202
item.description: CWE-416: Use After Free vulnerability exists that could cause arbitrary code execution, denial of service and loss of confidentiality & integrity when application user opens a malicious Zelio Soft 2 project file.

item.title: CVE-2024-8518|2024-10-08T13:51:42.894Z -- schneider%20electric -- zelio%20soft%202
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause a crash of the Zelio Soft 2 application when a specially crafted project file is loaded by an application user.

item.title: CVE-2024-8518|2024-10-08T10:12:52.204Z -- schneider%20electric -- zelio%20soft%202
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause a crash of the Zelio Soft 2 application when a specially crafted project file is loaded by an application user.

item.title: CVE-2024-8422|2024-10-08T10:09:34.543Z -- schneider%20electric -- zelio%20soft%202
item.description: CWE-416: Use After Free vulnerability exists that could cause arbitrary code execution, denial of service and loss of confidentiality & integrity when application user opens a malicious Zelio Soft 2 project file.
